pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: A beautiful double rainbow arches across a cloudy sky in this serene video. The scene is set on a quiet street with a concrete fence, lush green trees, and a tall palm tree in the foreground. The camera slowly pans upward to reveal more of the stunning natural display.
